Package be.projet3.toutouapp

Class ChatControllerTests

java.lang.Object
be.projet3.toutouapp.ChatControllerTests
@SpringBootTest @TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) public class ChatControllerTests extends Object
These tests validate the creation of a chat, retrieving chat by request ID, handling not found errors, and internal server errors for chat-related API endpoints.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      Initializes mocks before each test.

    • testCreateChatSuccess

      @Test @Order(1) @DisplayName("Test successful chat creation when request exists") public void testCreateChatSuccess()
      Tests successful creation of a chat when the request exists.

    • testCreateChatRequestNotFound

      @Test @Order(2) @DisplayName("Test chat creation with non-existent request (404 Not Found)") public void testCreateChatRequestNotFound()
      Tests the case when the request does not exist, resulting in a 404 error.

    • testCreateChatInternalServerError

      @Test @Order(3) @DisplayName("Test internal server error during chat creation") public void testCreateChatInternalServerError()
      Tests the scenario when an internal server error occurs during chat creation. This is simulated by throwing an exception in the request service.

    • testGetChatByRequestSuccess

      @Test @Order(4) @DisplayName("Test successful retrieval of chat by request ID") public void testGetChatByRequestSuccess()
      Tests the successful retrieval of a chat by request ID.

    • testGetChatByRequestNotFound

      @Test @Order(5) @DisplayName("Test chat retrieval with non-existent request ID (404 Not Found)") public void testGetChatByRequestNotFound()
      Tests the case when no chat is found for the given request ID, resulting in a 404 error.
